in ring MUNCIE, Ind.-- U.S. Mike Pence discussed his political future-- in somewhat nonspecific terms-- while addressing students in a Central High School social studies class Friday. Mike Pence acknowledged he was considering maybe coming home and running for governor, but the Republican said he was likely months away from making a final decision. He didn't completely rule out seeking a seventh term representing Indiana's 6th District in the U.S. House. While

at a Feb. 3, 2003, National Security Council meeting in which Colin Powell sketched out the presentation he was to make at the United Nations two days later. Rumsfeld quotes himself as telling the meeting: We should hit Khurmal during the speech, given that Colin Powell will talk about it. Khurmal is the name of a village near the site. Bill Lockyer , California's state treasurer, participated in a national telephonic news conference with EPI officials, to denounce the bankruptcy concept. No state needs to declare bankruptcy, Bill Lockyer said,`` The states have sovereign taxing power the big companies don't.'' Bill Lockyer 's point-- a valid one-- is that bankruptcy is the refuge for individuals, corporations and local governments
